acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

license.title: 2. Use License
license.intro: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
license.grant: This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

restrictions.commercial: use the materials for any commercial purpose;
restrictions.reverse: attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained in the service;
restrictions.copyright: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials;

disclaimer.title: 3. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on this service are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

limitations.title: 4. Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall we or our suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on our service, even if we or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our service.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

general.title: General Policy
general.content: We offer refunds under specific conditions as outlined below. Please read this policy carefully before making a purchase.

conditions.title: Refund Conditions
conditions.content: Refunds may be requested within 14 days of purchase if the service does not function as described or if there are technical issues preventing proper usage.

process.title: Refund Process
process.content: To request a refund, please contact our support team with your order details and the reason for the refund request. We will review each case individually.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.content: Refunds are not available for digital products that have been successfully delivered and are functioning as intended.

landing.title: Anticheat Panel - Secure Gaming for Everyone
landing.description: Professional Anticheat Panel for secure gaming servers. Protection against cheats, hacks and unwanted behavior.

hero.title: Secure Gaming
hero.subtitle: for Everyone
hero.description: Professional anti-cheat protection for your gaming servers. Detect and prevent cheating, hacking, and unwanted behavior with our advanced monitoring system.

features.title: Why Choose Our Anticheat?
features.subtitle: Advanced protection features designed for modern gaming

realtime.title: Real-time Detection
realtime.description: Instant detection and prevention of cheating attempts with minimal false positives.

dashboard.title: Advanced Dashboard
dashboard.description: Comprehensive control panel with detailed analytics and monitoring tools.

api.title: API Integration
api.description: Easy integration with existing server infrastructure through our REST API.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock technical support from our experienced team.

updates.title: Regular Updates
updates.description: Continuous improvements and new features to stay ahead of new threats.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Flexible configuration options to meet your specific server requirements.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple setup process in just a few steps

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Sign up for free and get instant access to your dashboard.

step2.title: Configure Settings
step2.description: Customize protection settings according to your server needs.

step3.title: Deploy Protection
step3.description: Install our lightweight client and start protecting your server.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing options for servers of all sizes

cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Server?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of server owners who trust our anticheat solution

footer.description: Professional anticheat solution for secure gaming servers worldwide.
